name: Thai Peanut Sauce
description:
An interactive, artistic recipe. Click an ingredient and the correct measure. Or click the incorrect measure and make the Gnome sneeze.

Continue adding an ingredient until it is gone. When they are all gone click the Gnome and he will stir it up for you. Click him again when you think he has stirred it enough. Use fullscreen to be able to read the words more easily!

The completed sauce pictured at the end was made from this recipe and eaten with great pleasure (though, strictly speaking, that particular time it was made with almond butter, but usually we use peanut butter for our peanut sauce!).

This was made in two or three days, depending on how you count it. It was originally made for a birthday card, and I hope it can bring some joy to you too.

Enjoy your Peanut Sauce!

 - Patrick

On Patreon!
